synopsis.text:
Makio Kidouin, a six-year-old girl from an affluent family, finds herself under the watchful eye of Youtarou Hanabusa, a young man with a unique condition he calls 'White Knight Syndrome.' As a descendant of the Knights of the World, Youtarou is instinctively compelled to protect those in need, leading him to don the mask of the enigmatic Knight Lancer.

When Youtarou discovers that Makio lives a solitary life in a grand mansion, he takes it upon himself to safeguard her, moving into her estate with his friends under the guise of lodgers. As he strives to maintain his secret identity, Youtarou must navigate a world filled with eccentric friends, cunning adversaries, and the unpredictable antics of his young charge.

Despite yearning for a normal life, Youtarou's chivalrous nature and formidable combat skills are tested as he faces challenges head-on. Will he be able to shield Makio from danger while keeping his true identity concealed? Join Youtarou, Makio, and their friends as they embark on a thrilling and heartwarming adventure that explores the true meaning of heroism and friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
